thread.title: Amanda
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Amanda

author: Amanda
title: Amanda
text: I was interested in trying the BBG program, but wondered if it would be anymore effective than other home programs I've tried so I hesitated because I didn't want to spend the money on something I could do on my own. When I saw it was 80% off I figured I'd give it a try. It was super cheap and I got the guides immediately upon payment. I'm excited to give the program a try and hope to see some wonderful results.
